title: Desperate for Workers, Companies Try Help-Wanted Ads on TV
sub_head: In tight labor market, Domino’s, FedEx look for hires through national TV spots; Dunkin’ recruits using social-media influencers
body:
Domino’s Pizza Inc. began airing a new television commercial several weeks ago, but the ad isn’t peddling pizza.
The Ann Arbor, Mich.-based company is trying to recruit workers.
